job_title: Licensed Practical Nurse (LPN) in Frankfort, KY

cons: Unfair pay, understaffed, don’t get your 15 min breaks, bad cafeteria food, patient safety concerns.

job_title: Registered Nurse, BSN in Frankfort, KY
pros:
There honestly isn't a pro anymore. You have medsurg nurses taking 7 to 10 patients a piece each shift. PCU nurses taking 6 patients and ICU taking 3.

Wages stay stagnant and benefits are crazy expensive and cover nothing. Run from any HCA company.
cons:
All about profit
Terrible patients to nurse ratio
No breaks
No pay raises
